ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i haven t completed it, but i have gotten that rod...and it s easy, just use invis...the guards you have to pass don t see though invis...i just invised my
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 8 Feb 2000, Gregory Egan wrote:
> To anyone who has completed the Ice Comet quest, was wondering how the
> rod that is located in Neriak can be obtained if you are not a Dark
> Elf or evil race. Thanks for any hints.

i haven't completed it, but i have gotten that rod...and it's easy, just
use invis...the guards you have to pass don't see though invis...i just
invised my way in, and then once i got it found a safe place to gate
out...

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
